page.title: 14Mrs.Wright of Monks Kirby.
page.content: Mrs.Wright has lived in Monks Kirby for ten years.She has also lived in Birmingham and Wales the only thing she misses from the other places are the hills and mountains of Wales. She lives in a house that is known as the Alms House,which was originally four houses for retired workers from the Denbigh Estate.The Alms Houses were in the village known as Brockhurst that was seperated from the village of Monks Kirby by a stream and marshy land.The two villages are now joined by a main road which serves the school known as Brockhurst Middle .Brockhurst village itself is now known only as part of Monks Kirby village.
